quarks.samples.apps

Class AbstractApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • quarks.samples.apps.AbstractApplication
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractMqttApplication

    public abstract class AbstractApplication
extends java.lang.Object
    An Application base class.

    Application instances need to:

    • define an implementation for buildTopology(Topology)
    • call run() to build and submit the topology for execution.

    The class provides some common processing needs:

    • Support for an external configuration file
    • Provides a TopologyProviderFactory
    • Provides a ApplicationUtilities
    See Also:
    AbstractMqttApplication

      • preBuildTopology

        protected void preBuildTopology(Topology t)
        A hook for a subclass to do things prior to the invocation of buildTopology(Topology).

        The default implementation is a no-op.

        Parameters:
        t - the application's topology
